metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0551 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A remote denial of service vulnerability in libavc in Mediaserver could enable an attacker to use a specially crafted file to cause a device hang or reboot. This issue is rated as High severity due to the possibility of remote denial of service. Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1. Android ID: A-34097231.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> See CVE-2015-1538 for information on ubuntu use of android tools

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
